metadata.name: 15 SPF Fps Premium Sunscreen 0 03 mg 1mL Liquid

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated to be used as an UV B absorbing molecule in sunscreen formulations

contraindications.disease: Dermal LD50 in rat is 3000 mg kg and oral LD50 in rat is 16000 mg kg L1870
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Ensulizole is a selective UV B filter with little activity against UV A wavelengths _In vitro_ ensulizole oxidizes guanine bases upon photoexcitation by UV B and may cause photodamage on DNA proteins and lipids in the cellular context A27151
